TEXT.TITLE: ESSELTE AB <ESB.ST> 1986 RESULTS
TEXT.BODY: Group profit after net interest items 742 mln crowns vs 741 mln. Sales 11.25 billion crowns vs 10.22 billion. Estimated profit per share 10 crowns vs 9.20. Proposed dividend four crowns vs 3.38. Reuter
